flawed_nl_solution:
The rancher would have sold his cattle for $204000/340 = $<<204000/340=600>>600 per head.
He was left with a remainder of 340 - 172 = <<340-172=186>>186 head of cattle.
The lowered price is $600 - $150 = $<<600-150=450>>450 per head.
He would make $450 x 186 = $<<450*186=83700>>83700 at the lowered price.
He could have made $600 x 186 = $<<600*186=111600>>111600 at the original price.
He would lose $111600 - $83700 = $<<111600-83700=27900>>27900
#### 27900

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 168, not 186. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
